column3: Okay,, can I just - say something crazy?
column7: All my life has been a series of doors in my face
column8: And then suddenly I bump into you
column9: I was thinking the same thing!
column10: Cause,, like,, I've been searching my whole life to find my own place
column11: And maybe it's the party talking,, or the chocolate fondue...
column14: But with you but with you
column15: I found my place I see your face
column16: And it's nothing like I've ever known before
column30: That's what I was gonna say!
column31: I never met someone who thinks so much like me
column33: Our mental synchronization can have but one explanation
column34: You and I were just meant to be!
column37: Say goodbye (say goodbye) to the pain of the past
column38: We don't have to feel it anymore
column43: Life can be so much more
column52: Can I say something even crazier?
